meanings.definition: A small knife with one or more blades that fold into the handle.
meanings.sent1: My grandpa always carries his trusty pocketknives when he goes fishing.
meanings.sent2: She bought a set of pocketknives for camping trips.
meanings.sent3: The pocketknives whispered secrets to each other in the drawer.
meanings.sent4: His words were sharp, like the blades of pocketknives.
meanings.sent5: The gleam of the pocketknives caught the sunlight, dazzling everyone.

meanings.definition: A knife that can be carried in a pocket.
meanings.sent1: He reached for his pocketknives to open the package.
meanings.sent2: The scout always had his pocketknives handy during hikes.
meanings.sent3: The pocketknives decided to go on strike and refused to cut anything.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sharp and unexpected as a set of pocketknives.
meanings.sent5: The weight of the pocketknives in his pocket was reassuring.
